PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-03932009-03-12,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActAeronautics Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I, VI AND VII) which address a need for provisions in the Canadian Aviation Regulations (CARs) that enhance the ability of air operators, private operators and their employees to deal with the growing problem of aviation passengers who are unruly and disruptive and who may present a safety risk to other passengers, crew members, the aircraft or property.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0090 Publication Date: 2009-04-01
